actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill authorizing the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish a national cemetery at Vandenberg Air Force Base, Calif.

summary.text: Directs and authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish a national cemetery at Vandenberg Air Force Base, California. Directs the Administrator to provide for and maintain such cemetery. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish a national cemetery at Vandenberg Air Force Base, Calif.
